statements: SELECT * FROM PatientGeneticData WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_option FROM PatientGeneticData WHERE genetic_code LIKE '%ACGT%';
SELECT * FROM PatientGeneticData WHERE treatment_option = 'Medication' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM PatientGeneticData WHERE patient_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT patient_id, genetic_code FROM PatientGeneticData WHERE patient_id < 5 AND treatment_option IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM PatientGeneticData WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_option FROM PatientGeneticData WHERE patient_id > 5 ORDER BY treatment_option ASC;
SELECT patient_name, genetic_code FROM PatientGeneticData WHERE treatment_option = 'Medication' AND patient_id BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM PatientGeneticData WHERE treatment_option LIKE '%surgery%';
SELECT * FROM PatientGeneticData WHERE treatment_option IN ('Medication', 'Surgery') ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_options FROM patient_data WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19';
SELECT * FROM genetic_information ORDER BY genetic_id;
SELECT patient_id, genetic_sequence FROM genetic_information WHERE genetic_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE diagnosis IN ('Flu', 'Cold', 'Allergy')
SELECT patient_id, genetic_id, genetic_sequence FROM genetic_information ORDER BY genetic_id LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, treatment_options FROM patient_data WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 OR diagnosis = 'Cancer'

SELECT patient_name, COUNT(genetic_id) AS num_genetic_data FROM patient_data JOIN genetic_information ON patient_data.patient_id = genetic_information.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name HAVING num_genetic_data > 1 ORDER BY num_genetic_data DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM GeneticInfo JOIN Patients ON GeneticInfo.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_option FROM Patients JOIN TreatmentOptions ON Patients.patient_id = TreatmentOptions.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, GeneticInfo.genetic_data FROM Patients JOIN GeneticInfo ON Patients.patient_id = GeneticInfo.patient_id;
SELECT TreatmentOptions.treatment_option, Patients.patient_name FROM TreatmentOptions LEFT JOIN Patients ON TreatmentOptions.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;

SELECT Patients.patient_id, COUNT(TreatmentOptions.option_id) AS num_options FROM Patients LEFT JOIN TreatmentOptions ON Patients.patient_id = TreatmentOptions.patient_id GROUP BY Patients.patient_id HAVING COUNT(TreatmentOptions.option_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT patient_id, gender, blood_type FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_id, gene_expression FROM Genetic_Data WHERE mutation_status = 'Mutated';
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_description FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_status = 'Completed' AND treatment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Medical_Records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%Cancer%';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT treatment_name, medication, dosage FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_name = 'Chemotherapy';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital FROM Doctors ORDER BY hospital ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital FROM Doctors ORDER BY specialization ASC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, GeneticData.mutation_status, GeneticData.testing_date FROM Patients INNER JOIN GeneticData ON Patients.patient_id = GeneticData.patient_id WHERE GeneticData.mutation_status='Positive';
SELECT treatment_name, medication, dosage FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_name LIKE '%Chemotherapy%' OR treatment_name LIKE '%Radiation%';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Treatments.treatment_name, PatientTreatmentHistory.treatment_date, PatientTreatmentHistory.outcome FROM Patients INNER JOIN PatientTreatmentHistory ON Patients.patient_id = PatientTreatmentHistory.patient_id INNER JOIN Treatments ON PatientTreatmentHistory.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id;
